description: Numbers n such that prime(n)+2^prime(n) is prime.
comments: a(6) > 3002, since prime(3002) = 27479 (see comment by _Ralf Stephan_ in A057663). - _Michel Marcus_, Dec 20 2013These values correspond to indices ip = 2, 3, 9, 10, 11 where A052007(ip) is prime. - _Michel Marcus_, Dec 20 2013
author: _Labos Elemer_, Oct 16 2000
